name: Orbimesh Document Analysis Agent
description: Professional WORD DOCUMENT processing agent for DOCX, TXT, and PDF files ONLY. NOT for spreadsheets (CSV, Excel) - use Spreadsheet Agent for those. Capabilities: RAG-based Q&A, document display, advanced Word editing (formatting, tables, images, lists).

endpoints.description: ONLY for answering questions ABOUT a document's content (e.g., 'What is this document about?', 'Summarize the key points'). NOT for editing or modifying documents. Uses RAG to analyze document content and answer questions. Supports analyzing multiple documents at once. Always displays the document in canvas.

parameters.name: vector_store_path
parameters.description: The file path to the FAISS vector store index for a SINGLE document. Use this for backward compatibility when analyzing one document.

parameters.name: vector_store_paths
parameters.description: Array of file paths to FAISS vector store indexes for MULTIPLE documents. Use this when analyzing multiple documents together. The agent will merge all vector stores and answer questions across all documents.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The user's question about the document(s) (e.g., 'What are the main conclusions of this report?', 'List all products mentioned in these RFPs').

endpoints.description: Displays a document (PDF, DOCX, TXT) in the canvas for viewing.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the document file to display.

endpoints.description: Creates a new document with the provided content. Always creates immediately and displays the result.

ONLY for MODIFYING or EDITING document content using natural language instructions. The agent will analyze the document structure and intelligently interpret the instruction to execute the appropriate edits. Supports all Word editing capabilities: formatting (colors, fonts, styles, bold, italic, underline, highlight), adding/removing content (paragraphs, headings, lists, tables, images), page layout (headers, footers, page breaks, sections), and advanced features (hyperlinks, find/replace, tab stops). Always executes immediately and displays the edited document. Use this endpoint for ANY request to change, modify, format, or edit a document.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the document to edit.

parameters.name: instruction
parameters.description: Natural language instruction describing the desired edit. Examples: 'Make all subheadings red and bold', 'Add a table with 3 columns for Q1, Q2, Q3 sales data', 'Change the conclusion section to italic', 'Add a header with the company name', 'Highlight all important terms in yellow', 'Add bullet points for the key findings'. The agent will interpret the instruction with full document context and execute the appropriate actions.

endpoints.description: Undo the last edit to a document. Restores the previous version and displays it. Returns undo/redo availability status.
Redo the last undone edit to a document. Restores the next version and displays it. Returns undo/redo availability status.
Get the version history for a document. Shows all saved versions with timestamps and descriptions.
